readList.title: Take the wrong train and get stuck somewhere chill. Fall in love - a lot.
Major in philosophy 'cause there's no way to make a career out of that. Change your mind. Then change it again, because nothing is permanent.
So make as many mistakes as you can. That way, someday, when they ask again what we want to beâ€¦ we won't have to guess. We'll know.
This isn't the time to make hard and fast decisions, its time to make mistakes.
